abstract.t: This document describes a mechanism to reduce redundant packettransmissions for the IS-IS Routing protocol, as described inISO 10589 [1]. The described mechanism can be used to reducethe flooding of Link State PDUs (LSPs) in IS-IS topologies.The net effect is to engineer a flooding topology for LSPswhich is a subset of the physical topology. This draft servesto document the existing behavior in deployed implementations.The draft describes changes to implementations, not to theprotocol. These changes are backwards compatible withimplementations that do not support this feature.
